00041 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Validator_Default extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractValidator {
00042         
00051         public function validate($gp,$settings,&$errors) {
00052                 
00053                 //set GET/POST parameters
00054                 $this->gp = $gp;
00055                 
00056                 //no config? validation returns true
00057                 if(!is_array($settings['fieldConf.'])) {
00058                         return true;
00059                 }
00060                 
00061                 //$disableErrorCheckFields = array();
00062                 if(isset($settings['disableErrorCheckFields'])) {
00063                         $disableErrorCheckFields = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$settings['disableErrorCheckFields']);
00064                 }
00065                 if(is_array($settings['requiredFields'])) {
00066                         foreach($settings['requiredFields'] as $field) {
00067                                 $settings['fieldConf.'][$field."."]['errorCheck.'] = array();
00068                                 $settings['fieldConf.'][$field."."]['errorCheck.']['1'] = "required";
00069                         }
00070                 }
00071                                 
00072                 //foreach configured form field
00073                 foreach($settings['fieldConf.'] as $fieldName=>$fieldSettings) {
00074                         $name = str_replace(".","",$fieldName);
00075                         
00076                         //parse error checks
00077                         if(is_array($fieldSettings['errorCheck.'])) {
00078                                 $counter = 0;
00079                                 $errorChecks = array();
00080                                 //set required to first position if set
00081                                 foreach($fieldSettings['errorCheck.'] as $key=>$check) {
00082                                         if(!strstr($key,".")) {
00083                                                 if(!strcmp($check,"required") || !strcmp($check,"file_required")) {
00084                                                         $errorChecks[$counter]['check'] = $check;
00085                                                         unset($fieldSettings['errorCheck.'][$key]);
00086                                                         $counter++;
00087                                                 }       
00088                                         }
00089                                 }
00090                                 
00091                                 //set other errorChecks
00092                                 foreach($fieldSettings['errorCheck.'] as $key=>$check) {
00093                                         if(!strstr($key,".")) {
00094                                                 $errorChecks[$counter]['check'] = $check;
00095                                                 if(is_array($fieldSettings['errorCheck.'][$key."."])) {
00096                                                         $errorChecks[$counter]['params'] = $fieldSettings['errorCheck.'][$key."."];
00097                                                 }
00098                                                 $counter++;
00099                                         }
00100                                 }
00101                                 
00102                                 $checkFailed = "";
00103                                 if(!isset($disableErrorCheckFields) || !in_array($name,$disableErrorCheckFields)) {
00104                                         
00105                                         //foreach error checks
00106                                         foreach($errorChecks as $check) {
00107                                                 switch($check['check']) {
00108                                                         
00109                                                         //uploaded file specific
00110                                                         
00111                                                         //file type matches one of the configured allowed types
00112                                                         case "file_allowedTypes":
00113                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateAllowedFileTypes($check,$name);
00114                                                         break;
00115                                                         
00116                                                         //only a configured number of files are allowed to be uploaded via this field
00117                                                         case 'file_maxCount':
00118                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateMaxFileCount($check,$name);
00119                                                         break;
00120                                                         
00121                                                         //uploaded files must have a minimum size
00122                                                         case "file_minSize":
00123                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateMinFileSize($check,$name);
00124                                                         break;
00125                                                         
00126                                                         //uploaded files must have a maximum size
00127                                                         case "file_maxSize":
00128                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateMaxFileSize($check,$name);
00129                                                         break;
00130                                                         
00131                                                         //the upload field is required
00132                                                         case "file_required":
00133                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateFileRequired($check,$name);
00134                                                         break;
00135                                                         
00136                                                         //value is required
00137                                                         case "required":
00138                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateRequired($check,$name);
00139                                                         break;
00140                                                         
00141                                                         //value should be a valid e-mail
00142                                                         case "email":
00143                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateEmail($check,$name);
00144                                                         break;
00145                                                         
00146                                                         //the value contains none of the configured words or phrases
00147                                                         case "containsNone":
00148                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateContainsNone($check,$name);
00149                                                         break;
00150                                                         
00151                                                         //the value contains at least one of the configured words or phrases
00152                                                         case "containsOne":
00153                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateContainsOne($check,$name);
00154                                                         break;
00155                                                         
00156                                                         //the value must contain all of the configured words or phrases
00157                                                         case "containsAll":
00158                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateContainsAll($check,$name);
00159                                                         break;
00160                                                         
00161                                                         //the value equals a configured word
00162                                                         case "equals":
00163                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateEquals($check,$name);
00164                                                         break;
00165                                                         
00166                                                         //value should not equal it's default value
00167                                                         case "notDefaultValue":
00168                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateNotDefaultValue($check,$name);
00169                                                         break;
00170                                                         
00171                                                         //value should be an integer
00172                                                         case "integer":
00173                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateInteger($check,$name);
00174                                                         break;
00175                                                         
00176                                                         //value should be a float
00177                                                         case "float":
00178                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateFloat($check,$name);
00179                                                         break;
00180                                                         
00181                                                         //value should be greater than X
00182                                                         case "minValue":
00183                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateMinValue($check,$name);
00184                                                         break;
00185                                                         
00186                                                         //value should be less than X
00187                                                         case "maxValue":
00188                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateMaxValue($check,$name);
00189                                                         break;
00190                                                         
00191                                                         //value should be between X and Y
00192                                                         case "betweenValue":
00193                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateBetweenValue($check,$name);
00194                                                         break;
00195                                                         
00196                                                         //value should be a string with a minimum length of X
00197                                                         case "minLength":
00198                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateMinLength($check,$name);
00199                                                         break;
00200                                                         
00201                                                         //value should be a string with a maximum length of X
00202                                                         case "maxLength":
00203                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateMaxLength($check,$name);
00204                                                         break;
00205                                                         
00206                                                         //value should be a string with a length between X and Y
00207                                                         case "betweenLength":
00208                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateBetweenLength($check,$name);
00209                                                         break;
00210                                                         
00211                                                         //value should be a an array with a minimum item count of X
00212                                                         case "minItems":
00213                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateMinItems($check,$name);
00214                                                         break;
00215                                                         
00216                                                         //value should be a an array with a maximum item count of X
00217                                                         case "maxItems":
00218                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateMaxItems($check,$name);
00219                                                         break;
00220                                                         
00221                                                         //value should be a an array with an item count between X and Y
00222                                                         case "betweenItems":
00223                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateBetweenItems($check,$name);
00224                                                         break;
00225                                                         
00226                                                         //value should exist in a db table
00227                                                         case "isInDBTable":
00228                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateIsInDBTable($check,$name);
00229                                                         break;
00230                                                         
00231                                                         //value should not exist in a db table
00232                                                         case "isNotInDBTable":
00233                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateIsNotInDBTable($check,$name);
00234                                                         break;
00235                                                         
00236                                                         //value should match a regular expression
00237                                                         case "ereg":
00238                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateEreg($check,$name);
00239                                                         break;
00240                                                         
00241                                                         //value should match a regular expression (case insensitive)
00242                                                         case "eregi":
00243                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateEregi($check,$name);
00244                                                         break;
00245                                                         
00246                                                         //value should match a captcha string generated by the extension 'captcha'
00247                                                         case "captcha":
00248                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateCaptcha($check,$name);
00249                                                         break;
00250                                                         
00251                                                         //value should match a captcha string generated by the extension 'sr_freecap'
00252                                                         case "sr_freecap":
00253                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateSrFreecap($check,$name);
00254                                                         break;
00255                                                         
00256                                                         
00257                                                         case "simple_captcha":
00258                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateSimpleCaptcha($check,$name);
00259                                                         break;
00260                                                         
00261                                                         //value should match a captcha string generated by the extension 'jm_recaptcha'
00262                                                         case "jm_recaptcha":
00263                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateJmRecaptcha($check,$name);
00264                                                         break;
00265                                                         
00266                                                         //value should match the expected result generated by MathGuard
00267                                                         case "mathguard":
00268                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateMathGuard($check,$name);
00269                                                         break;
00270                                                         
00271                                                         //the value is between a configured date range
00272                                                         case "dateRange":
00273                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateDateRange($check,$name);
00274                                                         break;
00275                                                         
00276                                                         //the value is a valid time
00277                                                         case "time":
00278                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateTime($check,$name);
00279                                                         break;
00280                                                         
00281                                                         //the value is a valid date
00282                                                         case "date":
00283                                                                 $checkFailed = $this->validateDate($check,$name);
00284                                                         break;
00285                                                 }
00286                                                 
00287                                                 if(strlen($checkFailed) > 0) {
00288                                                         if(!is_array($errors[$name])) {
00289                                                                 $errors[$name] = array();
00290                                                         }
00291                                                         array_push($errors[$name],$checkFailed);
00292                                                 }
00293                                         }
00294                                 }
00295                         }
00296                 }
00297                 return empty($errors);
00298                 
00299         }
00300         
00308         protected function validateMinFileSize(&$check,$name) {
00309                 $checkFailed = "";
00310                 $minSize = $check['params']['minSize'];
00311                 foreach($_FILES as $sthg=>&$files) {
00312                         if(     strlen($files['name'][$name]) > 0 &&
00313                                 $minSize &&
00314                                 $files['size'][$name] < $minSize) {
00315                 
00316                                 unset($files);
00317                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00318                         }
00319                 }
00320                 return $checkFailed;
00321         }
00322         
00330         protected function validateMaxFileSize(&$check,$name) {
00331                 $checkFailed = "";
00332                 $maxSize = $check['params']['maxSize'];
00333                 foreach($_FILES as $sthg=>&$files) {
00334                         if(     strlen($files['name'][$name]) > 0 &&
00335                                 $maxSize &&
00336                                 $files['size'][$name] > $maxSize) {
00337                                         
00338                                 unset($files);
00339                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00340                         }
00341                 }
00342                 return $checkFailed;
00343         }
00344         
00352         protected function validateMaxFileCount(&$check,$name) {
00353                 $checkFailed = "";
00354                 
00355                 session_start();
00356                                                                 
00357                 $maxCount = $check['params']['maxCount'];
00358                 if(     is_array($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$name]) && 
00359                         count($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$name]) >= $maxCount &&
00360                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep'] == $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['lastStep']) {
00361                         
00362                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00363                 } elseif (is_array($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$name]) && 
00364                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep'] > $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['lastStep']) {
00365                         
00366                         foreach($_FILES as $idx=>$info) {
00367                                 if(strlen($info['name'][$name]) > 0 && count($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$name]) >= $maxCount) {
00368                                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00369                                 }
00370                         }
00371                         
00372                 }
00373                 return $checkFailed;
00374         }
00375         
00383         protected function validateFileRequired(&$check,$name) {
00384                 $checkFailed = "";
00385                 session_start();
00386                 $found = false;
00387                 foreach($_FILES as $sthg=>&$files) {
00388                         if(strlen($files['name'][$name]) > 0) {
00389                                 $found = true;
00390                         }       
00391                 }
00392                 if(!$found && count($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$name]) == 0) {
00393                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00394                 }
00395                 return $checkFailed;
00396         }
00397         
00405         protected function validateRequired(&$check,$name) {
00406                 $checkFailed = "";
00407                 if(strlen(trim($this->gp[$name])) == 0) {
00408                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00409                 }
00410                 return $checkFailed;
00411         }
00412         
00420         protected function validateContainsNone($check,$name) {
00421                 $checkFailed = "";
00422                 $formValue = trim($this->gp[$name]);
00423                 $checkValue = $check['params']['words'];
00424                 if(is_array($check['params']['words.'])) {
00425                         if(!strcmp($check['params']['words'],"USER") || !strcmp($check['params']['words'],"USER_INT")) {
00426                                 $checkValue = t3lib_div::callUserFunction($check['params']['words.']['userFunc'],$check['params']['words.'],$this,"");
00427                         } else {
00428                                 $checkValue = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($check['params']['words'],$check['params']['words.']);
00429                         }
00430                 }
00431                 if(!is_array($checkValue)) {
00432                         $checkValue = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$checkValue);
00433                 }
00434                 $found = false;
00435                 foreach($checkValue as $word) {
00436                         if(stristr($formValue,$word) && !$found) {
00437                                 
00438                                 //remove userfunc settings and only store comma seperated words
00439                                 $check['params']['words'] = implode(",",$checkValue);
00440                                 unset($check['params']['words.']);
00441                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00442                                 $found = true;
00443                         }
00444                 }
00445                 return $checkFailed;
00446         }
00447         
00455         protected function validateEquals($check,$name) {
00456                 $checkFailed = "";
00457                 $formValue = trim($this->gp[$name]);
00458                 $checkValue = $check['params']['word'];
00459                 if(is_array($check['params']['word.'])) {
00460                         if(!strcmp($check['params']['word'],"USER") || !strcmp($check['params']['word'],"USER_INT")) {
00461                                 $checkValue = t3lib_div::callUserFunction($check['params']['word.']['userFunc'],$check['params']['word.'],$this,"");
00462                         } else {
00463                                 $checkValue = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($check['params']['word'],$check['params']['word.']);
00464                         }
00465                 }
00466                 if(strcasecmp($formValue,$checkValue)) {
00467                         
00468                         //remove userfunc settings
00469                         unset($check['params']['word.']);
00470                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00471                 }
00472                 return $checkFailed;
00473         }
00474         
00482         protected function validateContainsOne($check,$name) {
00483                 $checkFailed = "";
00484                 $formValue = trim($this->gp[$name]);
00485                 $checkValue = $check['params']['words'];
00486                 if(is_array($check['params']['words.'])) {
00487                         if(!strcmp($check['params']['words'],"USER") || !strcmp($check['params']['words'],"USER_INT")) {
00488                                 $checkValue = t3lib_div::callUserFunction($check['params']['words.']['userFunc'],$check['params']['words.'],$this,"");
00489                         } else {
00490                                 $checkValue = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($check['params']['words'],$check['params']['words.']);
00491                         }
00492                 }
00493                 if(!is_array($checkValue)) {
00494                         $checkValue = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$checkValue);
00495                 }
00496                 $found = false;
00497                 foreach($checkValue as $word) {
00498                         if(stristr($formValue,$word) && !$found) {
00499                                 $found = true;
00500                         }
00501                 }
00502                 if(!$found) {
00503                         
00504                         //remove userfunc settings and only store comma seperated words
00505                         $check['params']['words'] = implode(",",$checkValue);
00506                         unset($check['params']['words.']);
00507                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00508                 }
00509                 return $checkFailed;
00510         }

00519         protected function validateContainsAll($check,$name) {
00520                 $checkFailed = "";
00521                 $formValue = trim($this->gp[$name]);
00522                 $checkValue = $check['params']['words'];
00523                 if(is_array($check['params']['words.'])) {
00524                         if(!strcmp($check['params']['words'],"USER") || !strcmp($check['params']['words'],"USER_INT")) {
00525                                 $checkValue = t3lib_div::callUserFunction($check['params']['words.']['userFunc'],$check['params']['words.'],$this,"");
00526                         } else {
00527                                 $checkValue = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($check['params']['words'],$check['params']['words.']);
00528                         }
00529                 }
00530                 if(!is_array($checkValue)) {
00531                         $checkValue = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$checkValue);
00532                 }
00533                 foreach($checkValue as $word) {
00534                         if(!stristr($formValue,$word)) {
00535                                 
00536                                 //remove userfunc settings and only store comma seperated words
00537                                 $check['params']['words'] = implode(",",$checkValue);
00538                                 unset($check['params']['words.']);
00539                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00540                         }
00541                 }
00542 
00543                 return $checkFailed;
00544         }

00553         protected function validateEmail(&$check,$name) {
00554                 $checkFailed = "";
00555                 $valid = t3lib_div::validEmail($this->gp[$name]);
00556                 if(!$valid) {
00557                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00558                 }
00559                 return $checkFailed;
00560         }
00561         
00570         protected function validateNotDefaultValue(&$check,$name) {
00571                 $checkFailed = "";
00572                 $defaultValue = $check['params']['defaultValue'];
00573                 if(is_array($check['params']['defaultValue.'])) {
00574                         $defaultValue = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($check['params']['defaultValue'],$check['params']['defaultValue.']);
00575                 }
00576                 if ($defaultValue != '') {
00577                         if (!strcmp($defaultValue,$this->gp[$name])) {
00578                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00579                         }
00580                 }
00581                 return $checkFailed;
00582         }
00583         
00591         protected function validateInteger(&$check,$name) {
00592                 $checkFailed = "";
00593                 if(isset($this->gp[$name]) && !empty($this->gp[$name])) {
00594                         $ereg = "^[0-9]+$";
00595                         $valid = ereg($ereg, $this->gp[$name]);
00596                         if(!$valid) {
00597                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00598                         }
00599                 }
00600                 return $checkFailed;
00601         }
00602         
00610         protected function validateFloat(&$check,$name) {
00611                 $checkFailed = "";
00612                 $valid = is_float($this->gp[$name]);
00613                 if(!$valid) {
00614                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00615                 }
00616                 return $checkFailed;
00617         }
00618         
00626         protected function validateMinValue(&$check,$name) {
00627                 $checkFailed = "";
00628                 $min = $check['params']['value'];
00629                 if(     isset($this->gp[$name]) && 
00630                         !empty($this->gp[$name]) &&
00631                         $min &&
00632                         (!t3lib_div::testInt($this->gp[$name]) || intVal($this->gp[$name]) < $min)) {
00633                         
00634                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00635                 }
00636                 return $checkFailed;
00637         }
00638         
00646         protected function validateMaxValue(&$check,$name) {
00647                 $checkFailed = "";
00648                 $max = $check['params']['value'];
00649                 if(     isset($this->gp[$name]) && 
00650                         !empty($this->gp[$name]) &&
00651                         $max &&
00652                         (!t3lib_div::testInt($this->gp[$name]) || intVal($this->gp[$name]) > $max)) {
00653                         
00654                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00655                 }
00656                 return $checkFailed;
00657         }
00658         
00666         protected function validateBetweenValue(&$check,$name) {
00667                 $checkFailed = "";
00668                 $min = $check['params']['minValue'];
00669                 $max = $check['params']['maxValue'];
00670                 if(     isset($this->gp[$name]) && 
00671                         !empty($this->gp[$name]) &&
00672                         $min &&
00673                         $max &&
00674                         (!t3lib_div::testInt($this->gp[$name]) || intVal($this->gp[$name]) < $min || intVal($this->gp[$name]) > $max)) {
00675                         
00676                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00677                 }
00678                 return $checkFailed;
00679         }

00689                 $checkFailed = "";
00690                 $min = $check['params']['value'];
00691                 if(     isset($this->gp[$name]) && 
00692                         !empty($this->gp[$name]) &&
00693                         $min &&
00694                         strlen(trim($this->gp[$name])) < $min) {
00695 
00696                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00697                 }
00698                 return $checkFailed;
00699         }

00713                         !empty($this->gp[$name]) &&
00714                         $max &&

00717                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00718                 }

00729         protected function validateBetweenLength(&$check,$name) {
00730                 $checkFailed = "";
00731                 $min = $check['params']['minValue'];
00732                 $max = $check['params']['maxValue'];
00733                 if(     isset($this->gp[$name]) && 
00734                         !empty($this->gp[$name]) &&
00735                         $min &&
00736                         $max && 
00737                         (strlen($this->gp[$name]) < $min || strlen($this->gp[$name]) > $max)) {
00738                         
00739                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00740                 }
00741                 return $checkFailed;
00742         }

00751         protected function validateMinItems(&$check,$name) {
00752                 $checkFailed = "";
00753                 $value = $check['params']['value'];
00754                 if(is_array($this->gp[$name])) {
00755                         if(count($this->gp[$name]) < $value) {
00756                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00757                         }
00758                 } else {
00759                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00760                 }
00761                 return $checkFailed;
00762         }
00763         
00771         protected function validateMaxItems(&$check,$name) {
00772                 $checkFailed = "";
00773                 $value = $check['params']['value'];
00774                 if(is_array($this->gp[$name])) {
00775                         if(count($this->gp[$name]) > $value) {
00776                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00777                         }
00778                 } else {
00779                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00780                 }
00781         }
00782         
00790         protected function validateBetweenItems(&$check,$name) {
00791                 $checkFailed = "";
00792                 $min = $check['params']['minValue'];
00793                 $max = $check['params']['maxValue'];
00794                 if(     isset($this->gp[$name]) && 
00795                         !empty($this->gp[$name]) && 
00796                         is_array($this->gp[$name]) &&
00797                         $min &&
00798                         $max &&
00799                         (count($this->gp[$name]) < $min || count($this->gp[$name]) > $max)) {
00800 
00801                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00802                 }
00803                 return $checkFailed;
00804         }
00805         
00813         protected function validateIsInDBTable(&$check,$name) {
00814                 $checkFailed = "";
00815                 $checkTable = $check['params']['table'];
00816                 $checkField = $check['params']['field'];
00817                 $where = $check['params']['additionalWhere'];
00818                 if (!empty($checkTable) && !empty($checkField)) {
00819                         $where = $checkField.'='.$GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->fullQuoteStr($this->get_post[$fieldname],$checkTable).' '.$additionalWhere;
00820                         $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery($checkField,$checkTable,$where);
00821                         if ($res && !$GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_num_rows($res)) {
00822                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00823                         }
00824                         $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_free_result($res);
00825                 }
00826                 return $checkFailed;
00827         }

00892         protected function validateCaptcha(&$check,$name) {

00896                 session_start();
00897                 $captchaStr = $_SESSION['tx_captcha_string'];
00898                 $_SESSION['tx_captcha_string'] = '';
00899                 if ($captchaStr != $this->gp[$name]) {
00900                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00901                 }       
00902                 return $checkFailed;

00987         protected function validateTime(&$check,$name) {
00988                 $checkFailed = "";
00989                 $pattern = $check['params']['pattern'];
00990                 eregi('^[h|m]*(.)[h|m]*', $pattern, $res);
00991                 $sep = $res[1];                     
00992                 $timeCheck = explode($sep, $this->get_post[$fieldname]);
00993                 if (is_array($timeCheck)) {
00994                         $hours = $tc[0];
00995                         if (!is_numeric($hours) || $hours < 0 || $hours > 23) {
00996                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00997                         }
00998                         $minutes = $tc[1];
00999                         if (!is_numeric($minutes) || $minutes < 0 || $minutes > 59) {
01000                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01001                         }
01002                 }
01003                 return $checkFailed;
01004         }

01013         protected function validateAllowedFileTypes(&$check,$name) {
01014                 $checkFailed = "";
01015                 $allowed = $check['params']['allowedTypes'];
01016                 foreach($_FILES as $sthg=>&$files) {
01017                         if(strlen($files['name'][$name]) > 0) {
01018                                 if($allowed) {
01019                                         $types = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$allowed);
01020                                         $fileext = substr($files['name'][$name], strrpos($files['name'][$name], '.') + 1);
01021                                         $fileext = strtolower($fileext);
01022                                         if(!in_array($fileext,$types)) {
01023                                                 unset($files);
01024                                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01025                                         }               
01026                                 }
01027                         }
01028                 }
01029                 return $checkFailed;
01030         }

01039         protected function validateDate(&$check,$name) {
01040                 $checkFailed = "";
01041                 
01042                 # find out separator
01043                 $pattern = $check['params']['pattern'];
01044                 eregi('^[d|m|y]*(.)[d|m|y]*', $pattern, $res);
01045                 $sep = $res[1];
01046                 
01047                 # normalisation of format
01048                 $pattern = $this->normalizeDatePattern($pattern,$sep);
01049                 
01050                 # find out correct positioins of "d","m","y"
01051                 $pos1 = strpos($pattern, 'd');
01052                 $pos2 = strpos($pattern, 'm');
01053                 $pos3 = strpos($pattern, 'y');
01054                 $dateCheck = explode($sep, $this->gp[$name]);
01055                 if (sizeof($dateCheck) != 3) {
01056                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01057                 } elseif (intval($dateCheck[0]) == 0 || intval($dateCheck[1]) == 0 || intval($dateCheck[2]) == 0) {
01058                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01059                 } elseif (!checkdate($dateCheck[$pos2], $dateCheck[$pos1], $dateCheck[$pos3])) {
01060                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01061                 } elseif (strlen($dateCheck[$pos3]) != 4) {
01062                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01063                 }
01064                 return $checkFailed;
01065         }
01066         
01074         protected function validateDateRange(&$check,$name) {
01075                 
01076                 $checkFailed = "";
01077                 
01078                 $min = $check['params']['min'];
01079                 $max = $check['params']['max'];
01080                 $pattern = $check['params']['pattern'];
01081                 eregi('^[d|m|y]*(.)[d|m|y]*', $pattern, $res);
01082                 $sep = $res[1];
01083                 
01084                 # normalisation of format
01085                 $pattern = $this->normalizeDatePattern($pattern,$sep);
01086                 
01087                 # find out correct positioins of "d","m","y"
01088                 $pos1 = strpos($pattern, 'd');
01089                 $pos2 = strpos($pattern, 'm');
01090                 $pos3 = strpos($pattern, 'y');
01091                 $date = $this->gp[$name];
01092                 $checkdate = explode($sep,$date);
01093                 $check_day = $checkdate[$pos1];
01094                 $check_month = $checkdate[$pos2];
01095                 $check_year = $checkdate[$pos3];
01096                 if($min != "") {
01097                         $min_date = explode($sep,$min);
01098                         $min_day = $min_date[$pos1];
01099                         $min_month = $min_date[$pos2];
01100                         $min_year = $min_date[$pos3];
01101                         if($check_year<$min_year) {
01102                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01103                         } elseif ($check_year == $min_year && $check_month < $min_month) {
01104                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01105                         } elseif ($check_year == $min_year && $check_month == $min_month && $check_day < $min_day) {
01106                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01107                         }
01108                 }
01109                 if($max != "") {
01110                         $max_date = explode($sep,$max);
01111                         $max_day = $max_date[$pos1];
01112                         $max_month = $max_date[$pos2];
01113                         $max_year = $max_date[$pos3];
01114                         if($check_year > $max_year) {
01115                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01116                         } elseif ($check_year == $max_year && $check_month > $max_month) {
01117                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01118                         } elseif ($check_year == $max_year && $check_month == $max_month && $check_day > $max_day) {
01119                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
01120                         }
01121                 }
01122                 
01123                 return $checkFailed;
01124         }
01125         
01133         protected function normalizeDatePattern($pattern,$sep) {
01134                 $pattern = strtoupper($pattern);
01135                 $pattern = str_replace($sep, '', $pattern);
01136                 $pattern = str_replace('DD', 'd', $pattern);
01137                 $pattern = str_replace('D', 'd', $pattern);
01138                 $pattern = str_replace('MM', 'm', $pattern);
01139                 $pattern = str_replace('M', 'm', $pattern);
01140                 $pattern = str_replace('YYYY', 'y', $pattern);
01141                 $pattern = str_replace('YY', 'y', $pattern);
01142                 return $pattern;
01143         }
01144         
01151         protected function getCheckFailed($check) {
01152                 $checkFailed = $check['check'];
01153                 if(is_array($check['params'])) {
01154                         $checkFailed .= ";";
01155                         foreach($check['params'] as $key=>$value) {
01156                                 $checkFailed .= $key."::".$value.";";
01157                         }
01158                         $checkFailed = substr($checkFailed,0,strlen($checkFailed)-1);
01159                 }
01160                 return $checkFailed;
01161         }
